channel.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
channel.description:
Hey everyone im abit stuck on ZuberZoft 508 I dont know how to make my self owner... :S
[u]Folders:[/u] Bin Build Files src Worlds [You use worlds to run the source] [I think to make people owner is in Build] Because in Build i go to C:\Users\[MY USERNAME!]\Desktop\Server Stuff\ZuberZoft 508\build\data\characters\mainsave Then it says my name... then when i open it, it comes up with.
username:slave kilz0r password:[my ingame pw] rights:0 absx:1685 absy:5600 height:0 runenergy:100 gender:0 look0:0 look1:10 look2:18 look3:26 look4:33 look5:36 look6:42 skill0:1,0 skill1:1,0 skill2:1,0 skill3:10,1155 skill4:1,0 skill5:1,0 skill6:1,0 skill7:1,0 skill8:1,0 skill9:1,0 skill10:1,0 skill11:1,0 skill12:1,0 skill13:1,0 skill14:1,0 skill15:1,0 skill16:1,0 skill17:1,0 skill18:1,0 skill19:1,0 skill20:1,0 skill21:1,0 skill22:1,0 skill23:1,0 skill24:1,0 mute: 0 specAmount: 500 Xlog:0 quests:0 godWars0:0 godWars1:0 godWars2:0 godWars3:0 godWars4:0 null
Im not sure but you can find the client on moparscape called ZuberZoft 508
Please Comment Back Fast From Pkzima1

item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:254065”][quote author=pkzima1 link=topic=335627.msg2610337#msg2610337 date=1230748289]

username:slave kilz0r password:[my ingame pw] rights:0 absx:1685 absy:5600 height:0 runenergy:100 gender:0 look0:0
[/quote]
change the rights from a 0 to a 3[/quote]Dude, you cant do right 3 in 508’s its not like 317’s. Now go to the char files press your name and then it will look like this:

username:slave kilz0r password:[my ingame pw] rights:0 absx:1685 absy:5600 height:0

Make it look like:

username:slave kilz0r password:[my ingame pw] rights:2 absx:1685 absy:5600 height:0 Now save. Be sure you & the person is logged out.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
item.dc:creator: @Rii0N Rii0N
item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

Change the name of the recent owner of the server name in Login.java to yours. Its case sensetive so if your name ingame was ‘Pkzima’ add the name into Login.java as ‘pkzima’ without any CAPS. Compile and run. should work.

item.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
item.dc:creator: @xyddragon xyddragon
item.description:
@xyddragon wrote:

ummmm im not to sure how to make one but here is a compiler code that works perfectly

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
item.dc:creator: @xyddragon xyddragon
item.description:
@xyddragon wrote:

Ok

Step 1. go to your source

Step2. there should be a charcters folder

Step3. look for your name in the charcters folder.

step4. right click and hit edit.

step5. look for player right change yours to 3

step6. click exit. hit yest to save

step7. compile

step8. run your server and log in

Read full topic

item.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
item.dc:creator: @xyddragon xyddragon
item.description:
@xyddragon wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:11, topic:254065”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=335627.msg2610355#msg2610355 date=1230748656]
The rights won’t show on anyone’s clients because the clients only support mod rights of 1 and 2…
[/quote]
So you have the rights on the server but they don’t show on the client.
You have to send the rights differently to the client during login.[/quote] the rights show for me on my client

item.description:

first go to charcters then right click hit edit look for player rights put it to 3. save. then make sure your server is off then hit compile. wait till its done then go to run log in and see if that worked

item.title: Admins | Im lost :S lol
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

The rights won’t show on anyone’s clients because the clients only support mod rights of 1 and 2…

So you have the rights on the server but they don’t show on the client.
You have to send the rights differently to the client during login.

Read full topic
